message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this item to you for $12,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, I can only pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the price you're offering is a bit too low for me.  Could you consider $11,000?
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to offer $10,500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
